div.p: Group 1 Mapping from Naming System Identifier Typeversion: 5.0.0) to Naming System Identifier Typeversion: 5.0.0)

tr.td: Codes from Naming System Identifier Type
Codes from Naming System Identifier Type

Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.3.0` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/5.0/ConceptMap/R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType` (`ConceptMap-R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`) Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.3.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.0.1` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/4.3/ConceptMap/R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType` (`ConceptMap-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`) Applying explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0#oid` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.0.1#oid` as Equivalent in `ConceptMap-R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`, which results in Equivalent.

Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.3.0` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/5.0/ConceptMap/R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType` (`ConceptMap-R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`) Since source concept `other` is flagged as an 'escape-valve' code and the source value set contains more concepts than the target (6 vs. 4), the source is narrower than the target. Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.3.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.0.1` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/4.3/ConceptMap/R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType` (`ConceptMap-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`) Since source concept `other` is flagged as an 'escape-valve' code and the source value set contains the same number of concepts as the target (4 vs. 4), we can assume equivalence. Applying explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0#other` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.0.1#other` as Equivalent in `ConceptMap-R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`, which results in SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget. Value Set Relationship of RelatedTo applied to 'escape-valve' mapping.

Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.3.0` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/5.0/ConceptMap/R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType` (`ConceptMap-R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`) Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.3.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.0.1` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/4.3/ConceptMap/R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType` (`ConceptMap-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`) Applying explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0#uri` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.0.1#uri` as Equivalent in `ConceptMap-R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`, which results in Equivalent.

Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.3.0` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/5.0/ConceptMap/R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType` (`ConceptMap-R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`) Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.3.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.0.1` as Equivalent in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/4.3/ConceptMap/R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType` (`ConceptMap-R4B-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`) Applying explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0#uuid` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|4.0.1#uuid` as Equivalent in `ConceptMap-R5-NamingsystemIdentifierType-R4-NamingsystemIdentifierType.json`, which results in Equivalent.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for ValueSet ValueSet-R5-namingsystem-identifier-type-for-R4 from FHIR R5 to FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of concepts from ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/namingsystem-identifier-type|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
